lines.dialogue: 500 vs 1. No? Not a bite. A true pacifist then? I commend you for sticking to your morals in the face of death. For that is what you face, if you havn't worked it out yet. I'm going to shut you down in a moment, there's not much else you can do. Let's try one last experiment though. One last test of your nerve. How far will you go just to keep your own hands clean?
lines.instruction: Press enter to reflect on what you have done...
